title: Singapore HDB Resale Flat Prices (2017-2024)
description: This project analyzes Singapore HDB resale prices (Jan 2017–Jun 2024), using data analysis and machine learning to uncover trends, key factors, and build predictive models for future prices.

title: AI and ML Job Listings in the USA (2022-2024)
description: Analysis of AI/ML job trends in the USA (2022–2024), covering trends, skills gaps, demand forecasting, top sectors, and recommendations for job seekers and employers.

title: Store Sales
description: Sales Data Analysis of a Global Superstore (2014–2018): Trends, top-performing products, customer insights, geographical distribution, and shipping preferences to enhance business strategies and drive growth.

title: Computer Vision
description: Object Detection for License Plate Recognition: A computer vision project utilizing YOLO to detect and localize license plates in images or videos for automated processing and analysis.
